info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:26PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Butte, north central Meade and southwestern Perkins Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 726 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Mud Butte to 3 miles north of Newell. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mud Butte around 730 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Opal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northwestern and west central South Dakota.
